column4: Can anyone tell how I can get my sound out of all of my speakers only this front 2 are working.
ahh sorry its a creative soundblaster audigy SE
- right click on the volume > properties, somewhere in there you can toggle front/center/side etc.
- right click on the volume > open controls > preferences, somewhere in there you can toggle front/center/side etc.
- right click on the volume > open volume control > edit  preferences.
- mess around with your mixer, alsa stuff.
